metadata.title: DEPRECATED: Evaluate to true if the version datatype is properly supported
metadata.description: This definition is intended to evalutate to true if the interpreter properly supports the version datatype and all of its valid operations.

modified.comment: Deprecating in favor of new OVAL Test Content

criteria.comment: True if the equals operation is supported

criterion.comment: Check of the equals operation with a single equal version string.
Check of the equals operation with a single unequal version string.
Check of the equals operation with multiple equal version strings.
Check of the equals operation with multiple unequal version strings.
Check of the equals operation with multiple equal version strings that utilize mixed delimiters.
Check of the equals operation with multiple unequal version strings that utilize mixed delimiters.

criteria.comment: True if the not equal operation is supported

criterion.comment: Check of the not equal operation with a single equal version string.
Check of the not equal operation with a single unequal version string.
Check of the not equal operation with multiple equal version strings.
Check of the not equal operation with multiple unequal version strings.
Check of the not equal operation with multiple equal version strings that utilize mixed delimiters.
Check of the not equal operation with multiple unequal version strings that utilize mixed delimiters.

criteria.comment: True if the greater than operation is supported

criterion.comment: Check of the greater than operation with a single greater than version string.
Check of the greater than operation with a single equal version string.
Check of the greater than operation with a single less than version string.
Check of the greater than operation with multiple greater than version strings.
Check of the greater than operation with multiple equal version strings.
Check of the greater than operation with multiple less than version strings.
Check of the greater than operation with multiple greater than version strings that utilize mixed delimiters.
Check of the greater than operation with multiple equal version strings that utilize mixed delimiters.
Check of the greater than operation with multiple less than version strings that utilize mixed delimiters.

criteria.comment: True if the greater than or equal operation is supported

criterion.comment: Check of the greater than or equal operation with a single greater than version string.
Check of the greater than or equal operation with a single equal version string.
Check of the greater than or equal operation with a single less than version string.
Check of the greater than or equal operation with multiple greater than version strings.
Check of the greater than or equal operation with multiple equal version strings.
Check of the greater than or equal operation with multiple less than version strings.
Check of the greater than or equal operation with multiple greater than version strings that utilize mixed delimiters.
Check of the greater than or equal operation with multiple equal version strings that utilize mixed delimiters.
Check of greater than or equal operation with multiple less than version strings that utilize mixed delimiters.

criteria.comment: True if the less than operation is supported

criterion.comment: Check of the less than operation with a single less than version string.
Check of the less than operation with a single equal version string.
Check of the less than operation with a single greater than version string.
Check of the less than operation with multiple less than version strings.
Check of the less than operation with multiple equal version strings.
Check of the less than operation with multiple greater than version strings.
Check of the less than operation with multiple less than version strings that utilize mixed delimiters.
Check of the less than operation with multiple equal version strings that utilize mixed delimiters.
Check of the less than operation with multiple greater than version strings that utilize mixed delimiters.

criteria.comment: True if the less than or equal operation is supported

criterion.comment: Check of the less than or equal operation with a single less than version string.
Check of the less than or equal operation with a single equal version string.
Check of the less than or equal operation with a single greater than version string.
Check of the less than or equal operation with multiple less than version strings.
Check of the less than or equal operation with multiple equal version strings.
Check of the less than or equal operation with multiple greater than version strings.
Check of the less than or equal operation with multiple less than version strings that utilize mixed delimiters.
Check of the less than or equal operation with multiple equal version strings that utilize mixed delimiters.
Check of the less than or equal operation with multiple greater than version strings that utilize mixed delimiters.
